des:
This skill will enable you to ask Alexa to control your connected smart devices by voice - such as Air Conditioners, Lights and Switches.

*Note:
1. In order to use this skill, you need to install Reiri Home application on your device and connect to a Reiri controller.
2. Only the first 12 scenes you created at Reiri Home application will be reflected in this skill.
3. This skill only supports Heat, Cool and Auto mode (if applicable) for Air Conditioners.

Getting Started:
1. Launch Reiri Home application
2. Locate the Alexa feature under the Systems menu
3. Tap on Sign In with Amazon Account
4. Sign in with your Amazon Account
5. If login is successful, the name and the email of your amazon account will be displayed.
6. Launch Alexa application and sign in with the same Amazon account.
7. Search for Reiri Home skill and enable the skill.

Currently supported devices this skill supports:
1. Air Conditioner (On/Off/Set Setpoint/Set Thermostat Mode)
2. Light (On/Off/Set Brightness)
3. Switch (On/Off)
4. Scenes

Here are the things you may want to try with each device.

# Air Conditioner
Alexa, turn on my air conditioner
Alexa, set my air conditioner to twenty degrees
Alexa, set my air conditioner to cool mode

# Light
Alexa, turn on my light
Alexa, turn off my light
Alexa, set my light to fifty percent

# Switch
Alexa, turn on my switch
Alexa, turn off my switch

# Scene
Alexa, turn on Scene 1
Alexa, turn on Scene 2
